casebody.data:
Alan Steve LAMBETH and, Wife, Betty S. Lambeth
v.
NORTH CAROLINA FARM BUREAU MUTUAL INSURANCE COMPANY and Michael Auten. No. 126P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 6, 2006. Vaiden Kendrick, Wilmington, for Alan Steve Lambeth and Betty S. Clay Allen Collier, Wilmington, for Michael Auten. Tom Cox, Wilmington, for N.C. Farm Bureau.

AMENDED ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 14th day of March 2006 by Plaintiffs in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 6th day of April 2006."
